div.p: Apollonios to Zenon, greetings. Receive from Iatrokles the three thousand silver drachmas which we instructed that they be given to him in Caria from our account. Farewell. Year 28, Dystros […]
Year 28, 25 Dystros. Apollonios, regarding the 3000 drachmas from Iatrokles, to Zenon. Translation: L. Ferretti – P. Schubart – M. Tomcik, ZPE 201 (2017) 216
